attributes.action: instruct the Department for Transport to order all driving instructors to ensure that learner drivers have the right sort of temperament to drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I  believe driving, especially in busy areas, can become very stressful.  People with the wrong sort of temperament (not calm enough/too quick to lose control of their emotions) could cause accidents or road rage incidents in such circumstances.  Driving is not a right; it is a privilege which should be withheld from those who might affect others' lives by their actions or reactions.
